name: Detective (furkandemiryurek)
description:
TR BU OYUN MAGARA GAME JAM #5 İÇİN 72 SAATTE YAPILMIŞTIR.   Oyunun amacı :  

Cinayet işlenen bir evde 14 tane saklı delil var. Ve dedektif olarak bu 14 delili bulmamız gerekiyor.

EN THIS GAME CREATED FOR MAGARA GAME JAM #5 IN 72 HOURS   The purpose of game :  

There are 14 pieces of evidence hidden in a house where the murder was committed and you as a detective have to find these 14 pieces of evidences.
